about_the_game:
The cat always has a place to hide! It can be anywhere! Think carefully and find your lovely cat. It may be somewhere you’ve never thought about before, but please remember to avoid traps that will make you fail to get your cat!

Are you ready for a thrilling adventure with a furry feline friend? Join our adventurous cat on a quest to escape from various challenging and fun-filled environments in this exciting casual escape game.

Help find our furry hero through each level by solving puzzles, finding hidden objects, and outwitting cunning traps. You'll need to search for clues, and use your quick thinking and problem-solving skills to escape from each location.

As you explore each level, you'll be presented with a list of objects to find. You'll need to solve puzzles, search for clues, and use your quick thinking and problem-solving skills to find the cat from each location. And, you'll also need to use your keen eye and sharp observation skills to spot each item, but don't worry - there are plenty of hints available if you get stuck!

With dozens of levels to explore and new challenges to face in each one, this game offers hours of addictive fun for players of all ages. Whether you're a cat lover or just enjoy a good escape game, you'll find plenty to enjoy in this thrilling and entertaining adventure.

So what are you waiting for? Let's help our adventurous cat escape from all these challenging locations and enjoy the thrilling journey along the way! Download the game today and start playing!

2 Mode in 1 game :
Hidden Object / Escape Puzzle game - Find your cats here
Cat's Play Room - Nurture your cats

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Intel Core 3rd generation
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 series GPU
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core 3rd generation
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 series GPU
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

movies.name: Where is My Cat Game Play

name: Where is My Cat?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 3rd generation
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 series GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Where is My Cat is a purr-fectly delightful casual game with charming graphics and relaxing gameplay where you help a cute little kitty escape from various obstacles and challenges. Navigate through different levels and use your problem-solving skills to find a way out.
